maps.name: Crossing
maps.description: A large open map situated in a canyon. This map features plenty of lines of sight for long range engagements.

maps.name: Farmhouse
maps.description: A large map featuring plenty of medium to long range engagements.
maps.availability: Available in Beta 1, and the Pre-Order Beta

maps.name: Hideout
maps.description: An urban map that provides a wide variety of both long and short range engagements.
maps.availability: Available in Beta 1, and the Pre-Order Beta

maps.name: Precinct
maps.description: An urban map. This map contains many choke points and close quarter engagements.

maps.name: Refinery
maps.description: A tight map set in an oil refinery. This map provides plenty of flanking routes.
maps.availability: Available in Beta 1, and the Pre-Order Beta

maps.name: Summit
maps.description: A map set in a mountain village.

maps.name: Outskirts
maps.description: A map set in a urban environment. The map has a range of different engagement areas. There are three distinct areas: construction site with trenches and buildings, residential compound on a hill, and shanty town around electrical substation.

maps.name: Ministry
maps.description: A remastered version of most popular maps from the original Insurgency 2014. Set mostly indoors, it features tight, close range CQB-focused combat. Features extremely close quarters fighting in the interior of a besieged ministry building with narrow corridors, a vast marbled lobby, and a crowded underground parking garage.

maps.name: Hillside
maps.description: Hillside is a recreation of the classic Insurgency map Sinjar. Sinjar has been around since the original Insurgency: Modern Infantry Combat (2007) and recreated for Insurgency 2014. This map provides a wide variety of both long and short range combat.

maps.name: Power Plant
maps.description: A fast, action-paced map, designed around CQB (Close Quarters Battle) principles. Unlike other maps, Power Plant has a more green environment. It is an abandoned, overgrown industrial site with a giant dam visible from almost anywhere in the map.

metadata.note: These are the official maps from Insurgency: Sandstorm as documented in the archive wiki
